title: Malcolm McKinnon: 6 films for MAP at ACMI

abstract: 6 mini-docos on local stories, by locals from the Wimmera/Mallee region
description: A collection of six short documentary films from an ongoing project between the filmmaker, Malcolm McKinnon, and small museums in the Wimmera farming region of Victoria. They comprise of local stories told by local people from such areas as Warracknabeal, Rainbow, Murtoa, Brim and Coromby.
